ComicInfo.Summary:
ZIM's tragic past revealed? Nope! No. Never. Why. But other things will be revealed! Critically acclaimed comedy cartoonist Kyle Starks and also critically acclaimed cartoonist Dave Crosland join forces on this explosive issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Crosland & Warren Wucinich | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Kyle Starks | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 23:45:24. [CVDB514518]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dave Crosland, Kyle Starks, Warren Wucinich
ComicInfo.Editor: Eric Trueheart, Jhonen Vasquez, Robin Herrera
ComicInfo.Characters: Battleslug 7000, Dib Membrane, GIR, Recap Kid, Zim
